elements.text:
You are at work and hear some of your coworkers having a conversation behind you. As you listen, you realize that you were not invited to a small gathering, and a few of your coworkers and friends were all hanging out without you. 

Here are some thoughts that might pop into mind:

texts: My coworkers must not actually like me. But, I know that's not the case; we have a lot of fun together.
I think about all the good times I've had with my friends from work.
I wonder if I was excluded intentionally, but I remember that I've spent time with coworkers without everyone there too.
I think they meant to leave me out of the gathering.
